data.text: Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se:
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Tiro sodifo no se: ‘Sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:
Wunim nyansa sen Daniel ana?
Wonam wo nyansa ne nhumu so
Wonam wʼaguadi mu nyansa so
“ ‘Ɛno nti sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:
mede ananafo reba abetia wo,
Wɔde wo bɛto amoa no mu,
Afei wobɛka se, “Meyɛ onyame,”
Wubewu momonotofo wu
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se:
“Onipa ba, ma kwadwom a ɛfa Tirohene ho so na ka kyerɛ no se: ‘Sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:
Na anka wowɔ Eden
Wɔsraa wo ngo sɛ ɔhwɛfo kerub,
Na anka wʼakwan ho nni asɛm
Wʼaguadi a mu trɛw no nti
Wohyerɛn wɔ wo koma mu
Wode wo nnebɔne ne aguadi mu asisi
Aman a na wonim wo nyinaa
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se:
“Onipa ba, fa wʼani kyerɛ Sidon na hyɛ nkɔm tia no
na ka se: ‘Sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:
Mɛma ɔyaredɔm aba ne so
“ ‘Na Israelfo rennya yɔnkonom a wɔwɔ adwemmɔne, wɔn a wɔwowɔ yayaayaw sɛ ohwirem ne nsɔe bio. Afei na wobehu sɛ mene Otumfo Awurade no.

“ ‘Sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se: Sɛ meboa Israelfo ano fi aman a wabɔ wɔn apete no so a, mɛda me kronkronyɛ adi wɔ wɔn mu, ama amanaman no ahu. Afei wɔbɛtena wɔn ankasa asase a mede maa me somfo Yakob no so.
Wɔbɛtena hɔ asomdwoe mu na wobesisi adan, ayeyɛ bobe nturo; Wɔbɛtena ase asomdwoe mu wɔ bere a matwe ne yɔnkonom a wɔkasa tiaa no no nyinaa aso. Afei wobehu sɛ mene Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn no.’ ”
